data.text: @Royalletea Hi Alexander! Please be advised that once the fund expired, it is already considered forfeited. Thank you!
@jonesygeez I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!
@xiankitty Hi Xiankitty. Valid Government ID is one of the requirment to Boracay. For more info, kindly  click this link :  https://t.co/lBwTdD16AJ. Thanks!

@jonesygeez Regret on the error, Nick. We will be glad to look into it. To further assist you and the security of your information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wmmkV . Or, send us a private message through: https://t.co/gNaqWV5Qww. Thanks!

data.text: @IknowImJuicy We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience GeorGeena. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or delay any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.
@andreaasudario Hello andrea, got this!  Bern here. I'll reach out to a case owner and will respond to you soon. For the meantime, please monitor your email.

@nichtraucher08 We are sorry if you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent JiL V. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

@jendeukieluvv Hi Nini. Yes,  31inches luggage allowed in check in baggage. Any excess in piece, weight, and size (baggage that exceeds 39 inches) are subject to  Excess baggege Fee . For more info, please check this(https://t.co/lXA1ChoAfE). I hope this helps. Thanks!
@ih8useoul This is per passenger per way. Thank you!

@Joshua_DeeDee I'm sorry to hear about this experience Joshua. We encourage you to message us via: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi, and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Or, message us here: (https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK) and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

@ih8useoul Please be reminded that passengers are only allowed 1 hand-carry baggage with a maximum weight of 7 kgs and shall not exceed 56cm x 36cm x 23cm dimension. If exceeded the allowed & acceptable (size, piece, weight) we will have to intercept the baggage & charge Gate Baggage Fee.

@ih8useoul Hi namjoon 24/7. The Gate Baggage Fee varies per sector. Domestic-PHP1,000, Intl - Short Haul-PHP1,500 then Intl - Long Haul-PHP3,000. Rates may vary and be updated from time to time. Please check with our check-in or boarding gate agents at the airports for the most updated fee.

data.text: @_neethgie_ You're welcome and have a good day!

@iamkimcharlie We are sorry to hear your frustrations, Kim. Thank you for raising the concern also. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@itsmeAVIE_28 Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, mk Aavianca. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@_neethgie_ Yes, @_neethgie_, empty tumbler/water bottle may be accepted as hand carry. Be reminded that it will also be under the discretion of the airport security. Thank you!

data.text: @itsmepammiebee Hi Tita Pammie. Aquaflask is allowed on both hand carry and check-in baggage. No fluid/liquid should be present on the flask. It should be empty. Thank you!

@godessmom Hi Melissa! All confirmed bookings are non-reroutable, non-convertible to travel fund & non-refundable. Forfeited if tagged as no show. Also, to maintain the confidentiality of your booking & for security purposes, please do not post any of your booking details here.

data.text: @carolinaaapita Hi Lily Ador! Spare/loose batteries like Power banks, must be carried in hand-carry baggage only and must NOT exceed 100Wh (equivalent to about 20,000mAh to 27,000mAh depending on the output voltage). They must be individually protected to avoid short-circuit.

data.text: @lj_peachysoul Hi lj๑•́ ₃ •̀๑! You may check and search for the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule thru our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWSh1U . Hope to see you on board soon!
@yeojaph Hi, yeojaph! You may check on our existing promotional fares in our website https://t.co/wngAzjK13k. See you on-board!
@MissTHerMajesty Anytime Trizia!

@MissTHerMajesty Hi Trizia! Please be advised that confirmed flights are non-reroutable, non-refundable and non-transferrable. You can only voluntarily rebook until two (2) hours before the scheduled time of departure -- subject to a change fee and fare difference.
@riricoupshan Hi Riza! You may check and search for the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule thru our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWBdZU . Hope to see you on board soon!

@highteaatkepler Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Sky. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@xianmanuel Thanks for providing the case number, Christian. The handler was already advised to revisit the case and revert to the email. Kindly monitor it for the update. Thank you

@MNMYOI1104 Hi Minguin! You can bring your desktop / personal computer in your checked baggage. Please make sure to pack it safely (in bubble wrap and in a shock-proof box)  to avoid any damages. We will be asking you to sign a Limited Release Tag as well. Thank you

@edzelpaolo Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Ar. Pao. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@CanoneoRegie HI Regie! Tel here. To check and book a specific fare, route and/or flight schedule, kindly refer to our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWBdZU. Thank you! Hope to see you on-board soon.

@rrq_ejay Hi RRQ! Tel here. I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

@KewpieTheresa Please do not hesitate to send us a message via Charlie the chatbot on the Cebu Pacific website, start chatting anytime and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent and we will be glad to assist you on your concern. Thanks!
@KewpieTheresa Hi Pie! Regret if you feel that way. Rest assured that we continue to listen and improve our services so we can deliver the best experience for everyJuan.

@rrq_ejay Hi RRQ . We will be glad to look into your concern. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wEvz3 . Or, send us a private message through: https://t.co/gNaqWVnZKE. Thanks!
